parameters.name: crf

param_schema.title: Crf
param_schema.description: CRF value for output video quality (0-51). Lower values = better quality.

parameters.description: CRF value for output video quality (0-51). Lower values = better quality.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.name: width

param_schema.title: Width
param_schema.description: Output video width (divisible by 16 for best performance).

parameters.description: Output video width (divisible by 16 for best performance).

parameters.name: height

param_schema.title: Height
param_schema.description: Output video height (divisible by 16 for best performance).

parameters.description: Output video height (divisible by 16 for best performance).

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: high quality nature video of a excited brown bear walking through the grass, masterpiece, best quality

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: high quality nature video of a excited brown bear walking through the grass, masterpiece, best quality
param_schema.description: Text prompt describing the desired output video style. Be descriptive.

parameters.description: Text prompt describing the desired output video style. Be descriptive.

parameters.name: flow_shift

param_schema.title: Flow Shift
param_schema.description: Flow shift for temporal consistency. Adjust to tweak video smoothness.

parameters.description: Flow shift for temporal consistency. Adjust to tweak video smoothness.

parameters.name: force_rate

param_schema.title: Force Rate
param_schema.description: Force a new frame rate on the input video. 0 means no change.

parameters.description: Force a new frame rate on the input video. 0 means no change.

parameters.name: force_size

param_schema.title: Force Size
param_schema.description: Force resize method. 'Disabled' means original size. Otherwise applies custom_width/height.

parameters.description: Force resize method. 'Disabled' means original size. Otherwise applies custom_width/height.

parameters.name: frame_rate

param_schema.title: Frame Rate
param_schema.description: Frame rate of the output video.

parameters.description: Frame rate of the output video.

parameters.name: custom_width

param_schema.title: Custom Width
param_schema.description: Custom width if force_size is not 'Disabled'.

parameters.description: Custom width if force_size is not 'Disabled'.

parameters.name: custom_height

param_schema.title: Custom Height
param_schema.description: Custom height if force_size is not 'Disabled'.

parameters.description: Custom height if force_size is not 'Disabled'.

parameters.name: frame_load_cap

param_schema.title: Frame Load Cap
param_schema.description: Max frames to load from input video.

parameters.description: Max frames to load from input video.

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Embedded guidance scale. Higher values follow the prompt more strictly.

parameters.description: Embedded guidance scale. Higher values follow the prompt more strictly.

parameters.name: keep_proportion

param_schema.title: Keep Proportion
param_schema.description: Keep aspect ratio when resizing. If true, will adjust dimensions proportionally.

parameters.description: Keep aspect ratio when resizing. If true, will adjust dimensions proportionally.

parameters.name: denoise_strength

param_schema.title: Denoise Strength
param_schema.description: Denoise strength (0.0 to 1.0). Higher = more deviation from input content.

parameters.description: Denoise strength (0.0 to 1.0). Higher = more deviation from input content.

parameters.name: select_every_nth

param_schema.title: Select Every Nth
param_schema.description: Use every nth frame (1 = every frame, 2 = every second frame, etc.).

parameters.description: Use every nth frame (1 = every frame, 2 = every second frame, etc.).

parameters.name: skip_first_frames

param_schema.title: Skip First Frames
param_schema.description: Number of initial frames to skip from the input video.

parameters.description: Number of initial frames to skip from the input video.

crf.title: Crf
crf.description: CRF value for output video quality (0-51). Lower values = better quality.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

width.title: Width
width.description: Output video width (divisible by 16 for best performance).

prompt.title: Prompt

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the desired output video style. Be descriptive.

flow_shift.title: Flow Shift
flow_shift.description: Flow shift for temporal consistency. Adjust to tweak video smoothness.

force_rate.title: Force Rate
force_rate.description: Force a new frame rate on the input video. 0 means no change.

force_size.title: Force Size
force_size.description: Force resize method. 'Disabled' means original size. Otherwise applies custom_width/height.

frame_rate.title: Frame Rate
frame_rate.description: Frame rate of the output video.

custom_height.title: Custom Height
custom_height.description: Custom height if force_size is not 'Disabled'.

frame_load_cap.title: Frame Load Cap
frame_load_cap.description: Max frames to load from input video.

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: Embedded guidance scale. Higher values follow the prompt more strictly.

keep_proportion.title: Keep Proportion
keep_proportion.description: Keep aspect ratio when resizing. If true, will adjust dimensions proportionally.

denoise_strength.title: Denoise Strength
denoise_strength.description: Denoise strength (0.0 to 1.0). Higher = more deviation from input content.

select_every_nth.title: Select Every Nth
select_every_nth.description: Use every nth frame (1 = every frame, 2 = every second frame, etc.).

skip_first_frames.title: Skip First Frames
skip_first_frames.description: Number of initial frames to skip from the input video.

loras.title: Loras
loras.description: A list of HuggingFace or CivitAI download URLs (use line breaks to upload multiples)

embedding_models.description: A list of HuggingFace or CivitAI download URLs (use line breaks to upload multiples)

civitai_api_token.title: Civitai Api Token
civitai_api_token.description: Optional: Your CivitAI API token. Only needed if you are trying to download CivitAI weights that require authentication. You can create an API key from the bottom of https://civitai.com/user/account

animatediff_models.title: Animatediff Models
animatediff_models.description: A list of HuggingFace or CivitAI download URLs (use line breaks to upload multiples)

huggingface_read_token.title: Huggingface Read Token
huggingface_read_token.description: Optional: Your HuggingFace read token. Only needed if you are trying to download HuggingFace weights that require authentication. You can create or get a read token from https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens
